      • saveTimeTable

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Time> saveTimeTable(java.lang.String[] checkJourney)
                                               throws TimeSequenceException,
                                                      TimeSetException
        Check the verification of the timetable and return it
        参数:
        checkJourney - The journey to check and save
        返回:
        The arraylist of time. null when timelist has error
        抛出:
        TimeSetException - TimeSeqenceException
        TimeSequenceException
